Flag raising at Army-Navy "E" Award ceremony
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two soldiers raise a flag while another stands at attention in front of a musical band.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Awards; Army-Navy "E" Award; Bands; Flag bearers; Flags; Military uniforms; Soldiers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Army-Navy "E" award was given to corporations for excellence in war production.
